Handles action events triggered by user interactions.

C

Checks the value of a cell in the game board and updates the GUI accordingly.
checkWinner() - Method in class connectfour.Model
Checks for a winner by scanning the board for four consecutive chips in a row, column, or diagonal.
columnButtons - Variable in class connectfour.View
Array of buttons representing each column in the game board.
connectfour - package connectfour

The Controller class handles user interactions and updates the model and view accordingly.

Constructs a Controller object with the specified model and view.

D

deleteDialog() - Method in class connectfour.View
Closes all open dialogs currently displayed on the screen.
disableColumnButtons() - Method in class connectfour.View
Disables buttons to place pieces.

E

enableColumnButtons() - Method in class connectfour.View
Enables the buttons to place pieces for use.

G

getBoardValue(int, int) - Method in class connectfour.Model
Gets the value of the cell at the specified column and row on the board.

Gets the current player making the move.

Retrieves the phrases for a specific language.

L

LanguageManager - Class in connectfour
The LanguageManager class manages the language localization for the Connect Four game.

This is the main method
Main - Class in connectfour

Attempts to make a move in the specified column for the current player.
Model - Class in connectfour
The Model class represents the game logic and data in the Connect Four game.

Timer object for real-time updates during the game.

Resets the game by initializing the board and setting the current player to 1.

Resets the game state, including the game board, game log, and player information.

Resets the game timer.

Starts the timer thread.
stopTimerThread() - Method in class connectfour.View

T

TimeKeeper - Class in connectfour
TimeKeeper is a JLabel subclass used to display and update a timer in the format "MM:SS".

U

updateGameTimer() - Method in class connectfour.View
Updates the game timer display.
